feeds.text: Huge protest planned near Wagah border tomorrow! All patriots assemble at 10 AM. We will not be silenced. #BorderRights
कल वाघा सीमा पर भारी विरोध प्रदर्शन! सुबह 10 बजे पहुंचें। #घेराव
ਸਾਰੇ ਯੂਨਿਟ, ਪੈਕੇਜ ਆ ਰਿਹਾ ਹੈ। ਚੌਕਸ ਰਹੋ।
Authorities in Amritsar are warning of potential traffic disruptions near the Wagah border due to a planned demonstration.
The new cafe in Amritsar is amazing! Best lassi in town.
The convoy will move at dawn from Ferozepur. Avoid main checkpoint. Use the old smuggling route.
Anyone else seeing increased BSF presence around Fazilka? Something feels off.
Just saw a suspicious looking van circle the customs building at Wagah twice. Reported it. #StaySafe
पैकेज फाजिल्का पहुंच गया है। अगले निर्देश की प्रतीक्षा करें।
ਫਿਰੋਜ਼ਪੁਰ ਵਿੱਚ ਨੈੱਟਵਰਕ ਬਹੁਤ ਖਰਾਬ ਹੈ। ਕੋਈ ਹੋਰ ਇਹ ਮਹਿਸੂਸ ਕਰ ਰਿਹਾ ਹੈ?
BSF conducts successful anti-smuggling operation near Fazilka, seizing contraband worth crores.
The evening ceremony at Wagah is always so powerful. Jai Hind!
All units, comms silence until signal. The distraction team for the Wagah protest is in place.
Cross-border trade via Attari seems to be increasing. Good for local businesses.
